Class ContentCodecToBufferDecoder

java.lang.Object
io.servicetalk.encoding.api.internal.ContentCodecToBufferDecoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
BufferDecoder
@Deprecated public final class ContentCodecToBufferDecoder extends Object implements BufferDecoder
Deprecated.
Use BufferDecoder. This type will be removed along with ContentCodec.
Convert from ContentCodec to BufferDecoder.
